form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: OATH OR AFFIRMATION OF DEPONENT, FOIA ( (b)(6)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/27/2023 I have stocks and bonds with the following market value, as indicated on the attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. $ I have life insurance in the sum of $ With a cash surrender value of $ I own real estate valued at $ 80,000.00 With mortgages or other encumbrances thereon amounting to $ 35,000.00 Which is located at 10815 S.W. 157th Terrace Miami, Florida 33157 (Street and Number (City) (State) (Zip Code) 8. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: (Place an "X" in the appropriate column to indicate whether the person named is wholly or partially dependent upon you for support.) Name of Person Wholly Dependent Partially Dependent Age Relationship to Me FOIA (b)(6) 9. That I have previously submitted affidavit(s) of support for the following person(s). If none, state "None" Name exhmitted FOIA (b)(6) 10. That I have submitted visa petition(s) to the Immigration and Naturalization Service on behalf of the following person(s). If none, state none. Name Relationship Date submitted FOIA (b)(6) 11.(Complete this block only if the person named in item 3 will be in the United States temporarily.) That I do intend do not intend, to make specific contributions to the support of the person named in item 3. (If check "do intend". indicate the exact nature and duration of the contributions. For example, if you intend to furnish room you and board, state for how long and, if money, state the amount in United States dollars and state whether it is to be given in a lump sum, weekly, or monthly, or for how long.) OATH OR AFFIRMATION OF DEPONENT I acknowledge at that I have read Part III of the Instructions, Sponsor and Alien Liability, and am aware of my responsibi ilities as- an immigrant sponsor under the Social Security Act, as amended, and the Food Stamp Act, as amended. I swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this affidavit signed by me and the statements are true and correct. Signature of deponent Muchline Barno Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 15th day of August 1991 at Coral Gables, Florida My commission expires on COMMISSION EXPIRES: JULY 16. 1992. NOTARY PUBLIC. STATE OF FLORIDA. BONDED THRU NOTARX PUBLIC UNDERWRITERLY ature of Officer A administering Oath Title ,fidavit prepared by other than deponent, please complete the following: I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the deponent and is based or all information of which I have knowledge
